key.name: advrename-profiles
key.summary: List of advanced rename tool profiles
key.description: The entries in this array represent the profiles in the advanced rename tool with specific settings for each profile.

key.name: advrename-win-width
key.description: This option defines the width of the advanced rename tool window.

key.name: advrename-win-height
key.description: This option defines the height of the advanced rename tool window.

key.name: advrename-template-history
key.description: This string array represents the history of templates in the advanced rename tool.

key.name: directory-history
key.description: This string array represents the history of visited directories.

key.name: panel-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for the file panes if the “Use default font” option is turned off.

key.name: size-display-mode
key.description: Defines how the filesize will be displayed in the associated pane column.

key.name: perm-display-mode
key.description: Defines how the file permission will be displayed in the associated pane column.

key.name: graphical-layout-mode
key.description: Defines the icon style of files and folders in the file panes.

key.name: list-row-height
key.description: Defines the height of a row in the file pane.

key.name: date-disp-format
key.description: Format of the date in the file pane.

key.name: list-font
key.description: The font in the file panes.

key.name: extension-display-mode
key.description: Defines where the file name extension is displayed.

key.name: clicks-to-open-item
key.description: Number of left mouse button clicks for opening a file or folder.

key.name: left-mouse-btn-unselects
key.description: Defines if a click on an unselected item unselects already selected items.

key.name: right-mouse-btn-mode
key.description: Defines what happens when the right mouse button is clicked on an item.

key.name: delete-to-trash
key.description: Defines if items should be moved to trash by default instead of really deleting them.

key.name: icon-size
key.description: Size of icons in the file pane.

key.name: icon-scale-quality
key.description: Describes the different interpolation modes that can be used with the scaling functions.

key.name: mime-icon-dir
key.description: Directory in which MIME icons are located.

key.name: cmdline-history
key.description: This string array represents the history of commands executed in the command line.

key.name: horizontal-orientation
key.description: Defines if the orientation of the file panes should be horizontal or not.

key.name: gui-update-rate
key.description: Update rate of the graphical user interphase in 1/1000ths of a second.

key.name: show-devbuttons
key.description: Defines if device buttons are shown.

key.name: show-devlist
key.description: Defines if the list of devices is shown.

key.name: show-cmdline
key.description: Defines if command line is shown.

key.name: show-toolbar
key.description: Defines if the toolbar is shown.

key.name: show-buttonbar
key.description: Defines if the buttonbar is shown.

key.name: symlink-string
key.description: This string defines the default name of a newly created symlink. Leave the string empty to use the default value which is hard coded into the program code. A “%s” will be expanded to the item name for which a link should be created.

key.name: main-win-width
key.description: This option defines the width of the main window.

key.name: bookmarks
key.description: Each entry in this list represents a bookmark.

key.name: bookmarks-win-width
key.description: This option defines the width of the bookmarks window.

key.name: bookmarks-win-height
key.description: This option defines the height of the bookmarks window.

key.name: connections
key.description: Each entry in this list represents a connection.

key.name: main-win-height
key.description: This option defines the height of the main window.

key.name: opts-dialog-width
key.description: This setting defines the width of the options dialog window.

key.name: opts-dialog-height
key.description: This setting defines the height of the options dialog window.

key.name: column-width-icon
key.description: This option defines the width of the icon column.

key.name: column-width-name
key.description: This option defines the width of the name column.

key.name: column-width-ext
key.description: This option defines the width of the extension column.

key.name: column-width-dir
key.description: This option defines the width of the directory column.

key.name: column-width-size
key.description: This option defines the width of the size column.

key.name: column-width-date
key.description: This option defines the width of the date column.

key.name: column-width-perm
key.description: This option defines the width of the permissions column.

key.name: column-width-owner
key.description: This option defines the width of the owner column.

key.name: column-width-group
key.description: This option defines the width of the group column.

key.name: keybindings
key.description: Each entry in this list represents a keybinding.

key.name: main-win-state
key.description: The number represents the main window state, e.g. “maximized”, “fullscreen”, etc. and is calculated internally.

key.name: middle-mouse-btn-mode
key.description: Defines what happens when the middle mouse button is clicked.

key.name: save-dirs-on-exit
key.description: Defines if the current directories are opened again when GNOME Commander is restarted.

key.name: save-tabs-on-exit
key.description: Defines if the current open tabs are opened again when GNOME Commander is restarted.

key.name: save-dir-history-on-exit
key.description: Defines if the history of visited directories is saved on exit.

key.name: save-cmdline-history-on-exit
key.description: Defines if the history of commands in the commandline is saved on exit.

key.name: save-search-history-on-exit
key.description: Defines if the history of search patterns is saved on exit.

key.name: always-show-tabs
key.description: Defines if the tab bar is always shown.

key.name: tab-lock-indicator
key.description: Defines the style of the tab lock indicator.

key.name: case-sensitive
key.description: This option defines if sorting should be case sensitive.

key.name: symbolic-links-as-regular-files
key.summary: Treat symbolic links as regular files
key.description: This option defines if symbolic links should be treated as regular files. In the file pane they are listed between other files and not at the top if their target is not existing.

key.name: select-dirs
key.summary: Select directories when all is marked
key.description: This option defines if directories will be marked when all items in a file pane should be marked.

key.name: allow-multiple-instances
key.description: This option defines if multiple instances are allowed.

key.name: quick-search-exact-match-begin
key.description: This option defines if quick search should match explicitly at the beginning of an item name.

key.name: quick-search-exact-match-end
key.description: This option defines if quick search should match explicitly at the end of an item name.

key.name: dev-only-icon
key.description: This option defines if only device icons should be shown instead of icons and text label.

key.name: show-samba-workgroup-button
key.description: This option defines if the Samba workgroups icon should be shown in the devices list.

key.name: mainmenu-visibility
key.description: This option defines if the main menu is visible or not.

key.name: quick-search
key.description: This option defines the shortcut for quick search.

key.name: file-list-tabs
key.description: The entries in this list are used for restoring the tabs from the last session.

key.name: devices
key.description: The entries in this list represent the devices configured by the user.

key.name: device-list
key.description: The entries in this list represent the devices configured by the user.

key.name: favorite-apps
key.description: The entries in this list represent the favorite apps configured by the user.

key.name: search-win-width
key.description: This option defines the width of the search window.

key.name: search-win-height
key.description: This option defines the height of the search window.

key.name: search-win-is-transient
key.description: Defines if the search window is transient or if it can be minimized and moved behind the main window.

key.name: search-text-history
key.description: This string array represents the history of text searches in the search tool.

key.name: search-pattern-history
key.description: This string array represents the history of regular expression searches in the search tool.

key.name: search-profiles
key.description: The entries in this array represent the profiles in the search tool with specific settings for each profile.

key.name: quick-connect-uri
key.description: Unified resource identifier for quick connections.

key.name: ftp-anonymous-password
key.description: This string defines the password for anonymous FTP connections.

key.name: delete
key.description: Defines if deletion of an item should be confirmed.

key.name: delete-default
key.description: This setting defines the default active option in the delete confirmation dialog.

key.name: copy-overwrite
key.description: This option defines the default behavior when items will be overwritten by a copy command.

key.name: move-overwrite
key.description: This option defines the default behavior when items will be overwritten by a move command.

key.name: mouse-drag-and-drop
key.description: This option defines the behavior of mouse drag and drop operations.

key.name: hide-unknown
key.description: Hide files which type does not match to one of the other types.

key.name: hide-special
key.summary: Hide special files, such as a socket, fifo, block devices, or character devices.

key.name: hide-dotfile
key.summary: Hide files and folders starting with a dot

key.name: hide-backupfiles
key.description: Hide all files with a suffix defined as the backup pattern.

key.name: backup-pattern
key.description: The given string defines suffixes (separated by semicolon) for files which should be filtered out if backup files should be hidden.

key.name: dont-download
key.description: This option defines if remote files should be downloaded before opened by external programs.

key.name: use-internal-viewer
key.description: This option defines if the internal viewer should be used by default.

key.name: viewer-cmd
key.description: This string defines the command for starting the (external) viewer.

key.name: editor-cmd
key.description: This string defines the command for starting the editor.

key.name: differ-cmd
key.description: This string defines the command for starting the diff tool.

key.name: use-internal-search
key.description: This option defines if the internal search should be used by default.

key.name: search-cmd
key.description: This string defines the command for starting an external file search tool.

key.name: use-gcmd-block
key.description: This option defines if a terminal window should stay open after a command finishes inside of it.

key.name: terminal-cmd
key.description: This string defines the command for opening a terminal.

key.name: terminal-exec-cmd
key.description: This string defines the command for executing another command in a terminal.

key.name: sendto-cmd
key.description: This string defines the command for sending files to a receiver.

key.name: theme
key.description: This option defines the current color theme.

key.name: custom-norm-fg
key.description: Normal foreground color in custom mode.

key.name: custom-norm-bg
key.description: Normal background color in custom mode.

key.name: custom-alt-fg
key.description: Alternate foreground color in custom mode.

key.name: custom-alt-bg
key.description: Alternate background color in custom mode.

key.name: custom-sel-fg
key.description: Foreground color for selections in custom mode.

key.name: custom-sel-bg
key.description: Background color for selections in custom mode.

key.name: custom-curs-fg
key.description: Cursor foreground color in custom mode.

key.name: custom-curs-bg
key.description: Cursor background color in custom mode.

key.name: use-ls-colors
key.description: This option triggers if the value of the environment variable LS_COLORS should be used to dye files and folders.

key.name: lscm-black-fg
key.description: This option adjusts the foreground color mapping for LS_COLORS black value.

key.name: lscm-black-bg
key.description: This option adjusts the background color mapping for LS_COLORS black value.

key.name: lscm-red-fg
key.description: This option adjusts the foreground color mapping for LS_COLORS red value.

key.name: lscm-red-bg
key.description: This option adjusts the background color mapping for LS_COLORS red value.

key.name: lscm-green-fg
key.description: This option adjusts the foreground color mapping for LS_COLORS green value.

key.name: lscm-green-bg
key.description: This option adjusts the background color mapping for LS_COLORS green value.

key.name: lscm-yellow-fg
key.description: This option adjusts the foreground color mapping for LS_COLORS yellow value.

key.name: lscm-yellow-bg
key.description: This option adjusts the background color mapping for LS_COLORS yellow value.

key.name: lscm-blue-fg
key.description: This option adjusts the foreground color mapping for LS_COLORS blue value.

key.name: lscm-blue-bg
key.description: This option adjusts the background color mapping for LS_COLORS blue value.

key.name: lscm-magenta-fg
key.description: This option adjusts the foreground color mapping for LS_COLORS magenta value.

key.name: lscm-magenta-bg
key.description: This option adjusts the background color mapping for LS_COLORS magenta value.

key.name: lscm-cyan-fg
key.description: This option adjusts the foreground color mapping for LS_COLORS cyan value.

key.name: lscm-cyan-bg
key.description: This option adjusts the background color mapping for LS_COLORS cyan value.

key.name: lscm-white-fg
key.description: This option adjusts the foreground color mapping for LS_COLORS white value.

key.name: lscm-white-bg
key.description: This option adjusts the background color mapping for LS_COLORS white value.

key.name: case-sensitive-search
key.description: This option defines if searching within the internal viewer is case sensitive.

key.name: search-mode
key.description: This option defines the search mode of the internal viewer.

key.name: charset
key.description: This option defines the default character encoding.

key.name: fixed-font-name
key.description: Name of the default font with fixed character width.

key.name: variable-font-name
key.description: Name of the default font with variable character width.

key.name: display-hex-offset
key.description: This option defines if the hexadecimal offset should be displayed in hex mode.

key.name: wrap-mode
key.description: This option defines if too long text lines should be wrapped.

key.name: font-size
key.description: This option defines the default font size.

key.name: tab-size
key.description: This option defines the indentation width in terms of characters for a tabulator character.

key.name: binary-bytes-per-line
key.summary: Bytes per line in binary mode
key.description: This option defines how many bytes should be displayed in one line in binary mode.

key.name: metadata-visible
key.description: This option defines if metadata should be visible.

key.name: window-width
key.description: The width of the internal file viewer window.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The height of the internal file viewer window.

key.name: search-pattern-text
key.description: This string array stores the history of text searches within the internal file viewer.

key.name: search-pattern-hex
key.description: This string array stores the history of searches for hex values within the internal file viewer.

key.name: default-type
key.description: Default file suffix of archives created with the File Roller plugin.

key.name: prefix-pattern
key.description: The prefix pattern is used to build up the name for an archive created with the File Roller plugin.

key.name: autoload
key.description: This is the list of automatically loaded plugins, whereas each entry represents the file name of the plugin.
